objects.specification: A large rectangular booth floor with a high-end dark textured finish, designed for sophistication and durability, featuring a subtle matte sheen that complements the neutral gray walls.
A smooth, neutral gray wall panel extending from floor to ceiling, with a flat matte surface, designed to form one side of the enclosed booth.

A highly detailed modern exhibition car with realistic metallic paint finish, tinted windows, chrome-accented wheels, refined curves and a premium interior, oriented to face the booth entrance.
A bright red glossy reception desk with clean modern lines, featuring a smooth countertop, integrated cable management and visitor-friendly height for check-in interactions.
A small vertical pedestal display stand with an angled brochure holder, illuminated top panel, sleek edges and a complementary color scheme to showcase promotional materials.
